sentences.english: The stink bug population has been exploding this year.
sentences.chinese: 此類臭蟲數量增長今年呈爆炸勢態。

sentences.english: By coincidence or design, they are moderated extrapolations of current trends.
sentences.chinese: 有意無意地，這些預測是對目前勢態的保守推演。

sentences.english: This collection of poems also displays the poet's writing trend from edge-ization to internationalization.
sentences.chinese: 詩集反映出詩人漢語寫作從邊緣化走向國際化的勢態。

sentences.english: Yet things may get worse before they get better.
sentences.chinese: 然而，勢態好轉前，興許會惡化。
